channel.title: General store
channel.description: How do i add a general store ? And if i trade with a shop i can still change my gear and such what do i have to do ? Its a 508 bulby source. Just started coding :s

item.title: General store
item.dc:creator: @nickskeee nickskeee
item.description:
@nickskeee wrote:

[quote=“IamGretar, post:4, topic:414943”]I would personally start off with OverloadX source that’s based of I and it’s very easy to code

Link to download =http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=471713.0[/quote]
I trried it but i cant start it the run doesnt work
it i modify it it says
@echo off
title Server
cd ./bin/
java -cp .;mysql-connector-java-5.1.8-bin.jar -Xmx512m server.Server
pause

item.description:
@nickskeee wrote:

Butchd12:

Well, if its your first time coding, id suggest you slow down and work on a “Delta” source or a “allstar” and theres moer simple sources out there… start from step 1, dont start at step 4.

oh well i wanted to make a great server should i start a clean base ?
